clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate the Patient Tolerance, Pharmacodynamics and Pharmacokinetics of Lanthanum Polystyrene Sulfonate Powder
clinical_study.official_title: To Evaluate the Tolerance, pd, and pk of Lanthanum Polystyrene-sulfonate Powder in a Phase Ib/ IIa Clinical Trial in Patients With ESRD-HD Hyperphosphatemia With Multi-center, Multi-dose, Give the Drug Multiple Time

collaborator.agency: The First Hospital of Jilin University

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study is:
To evaluate the tolerance of lanthanum polystyrene sulfonate powder in patients with end-stage renal disease (ESRD-HD) hyperphosphatemia with multiple doses and multiple doses； To evaluate the pharmacodynamics of lanthanum polystyrene sulfonate powder in hyperphosphatemia patients with end-stage renal disease on hemodialysis (ESRD-HD); To evaluate the pharmacokinetics of lanthanum polystyrene sulfonate powder in patients with end-stage renal disease (ESRD-HD) hyperphosphatemia after multi-dose and multiple administration.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit（Day -1 to Day 17）
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit（Day -1 to Day 17）

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit（Day 1 to Day 13）
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit（Day 1 to Day 17）
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit（Day 1 to Day 17）

arm_group.description: There were 12 subjects in the group, 8 of whom took lanthanum polystyrene sulfonate powder, 2 took placebo, and 2 took positive control drug （lanthanum carbonate）
There were 12 subjects in the group, 8 of whom took lanthanum polystyrene sulfonate powder, 2 took placebo, and 2 took positive control drug （lanthanum carbonate）

intervention.description: D1 was administered once; D2-D12 was administered three times a day; D13 was administered once；
D1 was administered once; D2-D12 was administered three times a day; D13 was administered once；
